user.title: Connect to Unraid
user.description: Connect to your Unraid server using the GraphQL API. Requires Unraid 7.2.0 or newer.

data_description.host: IP address (for example, 192.168.1.100) or hostname/domain of your Unraid server.
data_description.port: HTTP port number (default: 80). Secure connections are handled automatically.
data_description.api_key: Generate in Unraid Settings → Management Access → API Keys. Requires ADMIN role.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Unraid
reauth_confirm.description: The API key for {host} is no longer valid. Please enter a new API key.

data_description.api_key: Generate a new API key in Unraid Settings → Management Access → API Keys

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Unraid
reconfigure.description: Update the connection settings for your Unraid server.

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of your Unraid server.
data_description.port: HTTP port number (default: 80). Secure connections are handled automatically.
data_description.api_key: API key with ADMIN role permissions.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect. Verify the host and port are correct and reachable.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key or insufficient permissions. Ensure the key has ADMIN role.
error.unsupported_version: Unraid version not supported. Minimum required: Unraid 7.2.0 (API v4.21.0).
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check Home Assistant logs for details.
error.already_configured: This Unraid server is already configured.
error.invalid_hostname: Invalid hostname or IP address format.

abort.already_configured: This Unraid server is already configured.

init.title: Unraid UPS Settings
init.description: Configure UPS power settings for accurate power monitoring.

data_description.ups_capacity_va: Optional. Your UPS VA rating (e.g., 1000 for a 1000VA UPS). Shown in sensor attributes for reference.
data_description.ups_nominal_power: Required for UPS Power sensor. Enter the Watts value from your UPS specs. If Unraid only shows VA, check your UPS label or estimate using VA × 0.6.

abort.no_options_available: No configurable options available. Options are shown when a UPS device is detected.

confirm.title: Reauthenticate Unraid
confirm.description: The API key for {host} is no longer valid. Click submit to enter a new API key.
